00page00.title: You are dead
00page00.body: The wieght of failure rests upon your back. Perhaps now is a good time to evalate your choices. Is this what you hoped for? Do you deserve this? Or perhaps you wish to try again?

start.title: It all begins with a choice...
start.body:
It's a simple choice, take your pick.

options.text: Welcome the end of all things

00page03.title: But...
00page03.body: But then again, maybe you made the wrong choice....
